results.title: Effects of combined pioglitazone and metformin on diabetes and obesity in Wistar fatty rats.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Hydrochloric_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006851 @@@HCl@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ induces a marked @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Side_Effects_of_Drugs_and_Substances</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065606 @@@hypoglycaemic effect@@@ accompanied by a reduction in plasma levels of total @CHEMICAL_Ketone_Bodies @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007657 @@@ketone bodies@@@ and prevention of excessive @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@bodyweight gain@@@ in Wistar fatty @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
